"The Seasonal Event":
"Seasonal Events are special events that only last for a limited time.

During this event, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change in the Retem Region, and limited-time Rappies will appear."

"During this event, Xitrae, a member of the ARKS Support Staff, will appear at each ARKS Base to act as a guide.

You can talk to Xitrae to accept Limited-Time Tasks, or to trade Seasonal Points for items."

"Also, during this Seasonal Event, there will be additional Event-related Daily/Weekly Tasks.

To learn more about Seasonal Events, talk to Xitrae and select \"Ask about the Seasonal Event\"."
